item.title: Texas pushes back against foreign land grab with 'strongest bill in the nation' against China, Iran, Russia
item.description: State Rep. Cole Hefner says SB17 is the nation's "strongest bill" against its four biggest adversaries: China, Iran, Russia and North Korea.
